gui.figura.dropconfirm: Do you want to add the following models to Figura?
gui.figura.button.tooltip.upload: Click to upload and show avatar in multiplayer
gui.figura.button.tooltip.reloadavatar: Click to clear you avatar locally and redownload it
gui.figura.button.tooltip.deleteavatar: Hold LEFT SHIFT and click to CLEAR YOUR AVATAR ONLINE
gui.figura.button.tooltip.deleteavatartw: Doing so will clear your avatar for everyone else, too
gui.figura.button.tooltip.resetperm: Hold LEFT SHIFT and click to reset the selected permission for this user
gui.figura.button.tooltip.resetallperm: Hold LEFT SHIFT and click to reset the permissions for this user
gui.figura.button.tooltip.clearcache: Hold LEFT SHIFT and click to clear all loaded avatar data
gui.figura.deprecatedwarning: *The use of models in the root folder is deprecated, see the wiki for more info
gui.figura.name: Name: %d
gui.figura.config.tooltip.previewnametag: Displays your NameTag on the model preview screen
gui.figura.config.tooltip.nametagmods: Allows the names of players be customized
gui.figura.config.tooltip.chatmods: Allows the names of players in the chat be customized
gui.figura.config.tooltip.listmods: Allows the names of players in the tab list be customized
gui.figura.config.tooltip.usenewnetwork: Toggles between using the new or old network for online models
gui.figura.config.tooltip.uselocalserver: Toggles between using a local server or the main online server for online models
gui.figura.config.tooltip.nametagicon: Display The Mark △ as an icon %d on the NameTag
gui.figura.config.tooltip.buttonlocation: Location where the Figura settings button should be
gui.figura.toast.upload.success.title: Avatar Uploaded!
gui.figura.toast.upload.error.title: Avatar Upload Failed!
